author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: ‘Tiruvarutpa Agaval’ parayanam, Railway Colony, 7.30 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: Discourse on ‘Tiruvilayadalpuranam’ by N. S. Sundararaman, Old Kalyana Mandapam, 5 p.m.; Abirami Anthathi parayanam, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: Discourse on ‘Tirukkuralum Saiva Neriyum’ by S. Kunjithapatham, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse on ‘Avvai Kural’ by A. K. S. Tirumavalavan, Sakthi Velammal Nagar, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust: Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Ramana Kendram: Ramana Sahasranamam and discourse by Kalarani Rengasamy, 11 Chokkappa Naicker Street, 6 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Yoga class, 6 a.m.; aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women)

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Ezhuthu: Discussion on Vetrimaran’s film Visaranai, Tamil Nadu Theological Seminary, Arasaradi, 5.05 p.m.

GENERAL

Madurai Kamaraj University: A. Muthumanikam, Registrar, inaugurates international seminar on ‘Religious conflicts and construction of harmony in literature: a philosophical perspective;’ R. Venkatraman, former Head, Department of Art History, addresses; S. Andiappan, Chairperson, School of Religions, Philosophy and Humanist Thought, presides, 10.15 a.m.

Thiagarajar College: Orientation programme on ‘Higher education - quality, evaluation, sustenance and enhancement for excellence;’ M. Eyini, Principal, presides, 11 a.m.

Thiagarajar College of Preceptors: Citizenship training camp, C. Nallakrishnan, Administrative Officer, delivers valedictory address, Teppakulam, 10 a.m.

Lady Doak College: A. Muthukrishnan of Green Walk inaugurates ‘Phyxplosion’16,’ inter-collegiate physics meet, J. X. Miller Auditorium, 9.30 a.m.

SLS MAVMM Ayira Vaisyar College: Fine Arts Club competitions, Kallampatti, 2.30 p.m.

Mangayarkarasi College of Arts and Science for Women: Entrepreneurship development programme, Lakshmi speaks, Paravai, 10 a.m.

Madurai Sivakasi Nadars’ Pioneer Meenakshi Women’s College: National seminar on ‘Emerging trends in computing technologies;’ M. Aramudhan of Perunthalaivar Kamarajar Institute of Engineering and Technology addresses; K. A. Chidambaram presides, Poovanthi, 10 a.m.

Indian Association for the Blind: 31{+s}{+t}Annual Day; Mridula Ramesh, Joint Managing Director, Southern Roadways, and Subbaraman Balasubramanyan of HCL Technologies address; C. Ramasubramaniam presides, Sundararajanpatti, Alagarkoil Road, 4.30 p.m.

Confederation of Indian Industry: Corporate engagement with Nirmala Sitharaman, Minister of State for Commerce and Industry, Fortune Pandiyan Hotel, 9.30 a.m.

Tamil Nadu Chamber of Commerce and Industry: S. Rethinavelu, senior president, inaugurates seminar on ‘Modern weaving and Government of India schemes for powerloom sector;’ T.L. Balakumar, Deputy Director, Regional Office of the Textile Commissioner, addresses; S. Santhakumar, General Manager, District industries Centre, presides, 178 B Kamarajar Salai, 10 a.m.

Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association: Sellur K. Raju, Minister for Cooperation, inaugurates 30{+t}{+h}Ideal Home Exhibition; V. V. Rajan Chellappa, Mayor, and K. Veera Raghava Rao, Collector, address; L. Murari presides, Tamukkam Ground, 5 p.m.

Kaviarasu Kannadasan Narpani Mandram: Birth anniversary of U.V. Swaminatha Iyer; R. Chokkalingam speaks, Chandran presides, 114/2 Tirupparankundram Road, 8.50 a.m.

Rotary Club of Madurai West: R. Madhanagopal speaks on ‘Peace and conflict resolution,’ Fortune Pandiyan Hotel, 5.30 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, RC School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Parasakthi Nagar, Avaniapuram, CSI Church, Narimedu, and Maniammai Nursery School, North Masi Street, 7 p.m.
title: Madurai Today
